name: BokenMomenta
description:
Ahh! U must have forgotten the Law of Conservation of momentum...
Newton would be mad at u..! 
Dive into a puzzle game about 
m1u1 + m2u2 = m1v1 = m2v2

                           

The objective is to make the green ball reach the orb with a specific velocity that varies at each level
[the correct velocity is hidden in the hints]
U can only control the blue ball with the right arrow key and control its velocity on hitting the green ball their velocity is exchanged as they are of the same mass that's 10kg.
Control: "Right arrow key" adds 1 to velocity each time
Press enter in dialogues to move on and continue

Thanks for Playing! XD

Tileset used Four season tileset by analog Studios! The pack was great and thanks a lot to analog studios

Here are the answers but only use them when in trouble! otherwise, ur experience might get ruined:
Tutorial: press the right arrow 7 times
level 1: press the right arrow 6 times
Level2: press the left arrow 8 times
Level3: press the right arrow 5 times
Level4: press the right arrow 4 times
Level5: press the right arrow 5 times
Level6: press the up arrow until the blue ball reaches the orb

Developed by BOGE :
